body:
Oh boy, a whole year? I believe that makes me the oldest staff member, without retirement or demotion.

Ask me anything (its been FOREVER since I did an AMA ;o)  :3

title: 1 year as staff AMA - Dawning :3

replies.body:
@Letsdigbooger - I love my pastas | Pepsi please ;3 | A HARD DECISION! (I would ahh probably choose moderator. I get to meet and chat with so many new and fun people whilst moderating, I don't wanna give that up!
@Dawson - Pastas, all kinds of pastas | Badminton | I am not a wombat ;o | I love you a lot <3 | Chicken pleeeease | Cake | Sheep..
@DaFrozenBlaze - I remember it felt amazing hah, I was incredibly ecstatic and I have grown a lot since then c: | Totally isn't me... :) | Removed because the gameplay got bad :^(
@bisamoveonfuseh_ -  I am 14, and I totally remember the Zodiac Warriors! I miss them *tears up*
